results.name: Difference between 2n^2 and the nearest square number.
comment: max(a(n)/n) approaches sqrt(2), and the indices of the maxima are apparently in A227792. - _Ralf Stephan_, Sep 23 2013
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(10) = 4 because the difference between 2*10^2 = 200 and the nearest square number (196) is 4.
